results.description: After casting your spell, you cast the Prismatic Bolt spell at 9th level without expending a spell slot, targeting yourself.
You feel a terrible sense of foreboding. Until the end of your next turn, all your d20 rolls are counted as if you rolled a 1.
You float up to 10 ft. above the ground, become prone, and start spinning for 1 minute. Your speed is reduced to 0 and all attacks have disadvantage against you.
All creatures within 120 ft. of you, including you, must roll a wisdom saving throw or be confused for 1 round.
You conjure a potted plant. You have the sinking feeling it was once a Wild Mage.
For 1 round, every time you take damage you must teleport 15 ft. in a direction of your choice.

You glow red. Your blood lashes any creature that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage to you for 1 minute. After taking damage, make a melee or ranged spell attack against your attacker. On a hit, they take 4d8 slashing damage.
You glow orange. A blaring siren resounds from your skull, which is uncomfortable. All creatures of your choice within 60 ft. must make a strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft. away from you.

You glow yellow. You become a tremendous source of static electricity for 1 minute. You can use a bonus action to briefly magnetize yourself to a metal object within 90 ft., instantly moving to within 5 ft. of the object.

You glow green. A creature of your choice within 60 ft. is swarmed by disintegrating frogs appearing from thin air. They must make a dexterity save or take 6d6 acid damage. On a successful save, they take half damage.
You glow blue as your skin is coated with magical ice for 1 minute. While ice, you have resistance to piercing, slashing, and cold damage.
You glow indigo as magical force shields you. For 1 minute, your armor class increases by 5. You cannot benefit from this spell and the Shield spell at the same time.

You glow purple. You become instantly aware of all dead creatures within 90 ft. of you. You can choose to detonate one of them. All creatures within 10 ft. of the corpse must make a constitution save or be unable to regain hit points for 1 minute.
You glow white for 1 minute, shedding sunlight and bright light in a 120 ft. radius, then dim light for another 120 ft. beyond that. The light is so bright you benefit from the invisible condition.
You glow with prismatic light and regain all lost hit points.
Roll once each on the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd level surge tables.
You regain 9 sorcery points. If you go above your maximum and don't spend the excess points, your sorcery point total will be lowered to your maximum after 1 minute.
After casting your spell, you can cast the Prismatic Bolt spell at 9th level without expending a spell slot.
Any metamagic options you apply to this spell are free.
